author: bencomic

panels.narration: Theatre presents:  Everybody Loves Lemmer.  Starring, Sir Alex Bebout, Dave "Socks" Bock, Lee Tisenskiel or whatever, "Fungahhh" Larry Evans, "Bullie" Ingram, and Greg Reed as Crank.
In tomorrow's episode, Crank has a midlife crisis after a disappointing birthday party;
Lemmer and Skullie go bear hunting.

title: ENTERTAINMENT TONIGHT: Giving the Bum's Rush
